description: The 29 year old is sentenced to nine years in prison after a trial he says was politically motivated.
title: Trevor Reed: Ex-US Marine jailed in Russia for assaulting police
title_page: Trevor Reed: Ex-US Marine jailed in Russia for assaulting police - BBC News
maintext: He pleaded not guilty to the charge of endangering the lives of two police officers who were driving him to a police station after detaining him after he attended a party in Moscow. He says he remembers nothing of the incident because he was drunk at the time.
